attributes.action: Newport Shropshire tree gone missing and nobody is doing anything about it
attributes.background: people ignore the sentimental value the tree has to the community as everyone likes looking at it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

In any case, investigating a missing tree would be a matter for the relevant local authority or police, not the Government or Parliament.
